page.title: 13MY SCHOOL DAY Part 1
page.content: My name is Christine and I am 11 years old. I have a younger brother. I live in a detached house near my school. I wake up about 7.30 a.m. and get washed and dressed in my school uniform. I go downstairs and eat cornflakes for breakfast. I usually watch'Good Morning Britain'on the T.V. while I am eating. I walk to school, which starts at 9.00. First, my teacher calls the register and then we go to the hall for assembly with all the school. After that we usually do maths until playtime when we go into the play- ground. I like skipping or talking with my friends and the boys always play football.After play we do English or watch a program called'Good Health' on the T.V. and do follow up work on it until dinnertime. I then eat my sandwiches, which I bring from home and have a long playtime afterwards.
